title: The T206 M & M Boys are For Sale
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: The T206 M & M Boys are For Sale
posts.post_content:
Two cards = One lot

Magee Batting with an apple Sovereign reverse SGC 40

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/37440/magee-batting-sov-apple[/IMG]

And Merritt with a Forest Green Sovereign 350 reverse PSA 3

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10477/merritt-sov[/IMG]

Both cards $113 shipped to your door hopefully. :eek:;)
